desc: LottoLove is a lottery ticket gift idea that donates to charity! The perfect gift that gives back for all occasions like corporate gifts or holidays. Gift to anyone in your life & they win a charitable prize for someone in need. Together we are making charitable giving part of everyday gifting and benefiting charities.

layout.text: reinvent how we show we care
our tickets are an experience that transforms lives
when you gift LottoLove you become a champion of change, connection & conversation
